title: Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore       The bookstore is operated by Eastern National, a partner of the National Park Service that sells books and other educational materials and operates many other bookstores at national park sites throughout the country. Proceeds from sales support National Mall and Memorial Parks and other National Parks. The Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial bookstore is located near the memorial entrance along West Basin Drive and is open daily from 9:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.
